Cara Mudah Armand Maulana Menjaga Kualitas Suara, Tidak Merokok
03 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Antara, Mitra Tarigan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Penyanyi Armand Maulana harus menjaga kualitas suara sebagai vokalis grup musik GIGI, salah satunya adalah dengan memperbanyak waktu tidur dan berolahraga. Armand, mengatakan ada dua personel yang wajib menjaga kondisi fisik dalam sebuah grup musik. Mereka adalah vokalis dan pemain drum. Sebab, kedua posisi tersebut membutuhkan stamina yang kuat.
"Vokalis dan drummer kalau staminanya turun langsung kelihatan. Kalau gitaris dan pemain bas kan tangannya jangan sampai cedera. Rahasianya, saya ya harus jaga kesehatan dan kebetulan saya dilahirkan sebagai orang yang suka olahraga dan tidak merokok," ujar Armand dalam peluncuran perangkat memorabilia eksklusif di Jakarta, Sabtu 2 November 2019.
Suami Dewi Gita itu mengaku waktu tidur yang kurang akan mempengaruhi kualitas suaranya seperti serak dan sumbang. Tapi, kondisi tersebut dapat diperbaiki dengan istirahat. "Kalau kurang istirahat, suara saya jadi fals, hilang konsentrasi, lupa-lupa lirik. Kalau kayak gitu, obatnya ya cuma istirahat. Saya juga belum pernah minum alkohol. Makanya, saya masih energik. Kan makan juga benar-benar dipola," ujar pelantun lagu "11 Januari" itu.
Armand juga bersyukur karena tidak pernah mengalami cedera pita suara seperti rekan-rekannya sesama vokalis. "Kalau pita suara rusak kayak Once, Judika, Lasso (Ari Lasso) sih enggak pernah. Tapi kalau suara fals, ya pernah. Kalau udah parah, baru ke dokter. Tapi saya punya triknya, ya harus tidur itu," kata Armand.

Easy Ways Armand Maulana Maintains Sound Quality, No Smoking
03 Nov 2019, 14:45 by Antara, Mitra Tarigan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Singer Armand Maulana must maintain the sound quality as a vocalist of the GIGI music group, one of which is to increase sleep and exercise time. Armand, said there are two personnel who are required to maintain physical condition in a music group. They are vocalists and drummers. Because, both of these positions require strong stamina.
"Vocalist and drummer if the stamina goes down immediately. If the guitarist and bassist don't get injured, the secret is, I have to take care of my health and I happen to be born as a sports person and don't smoke," Armand said in the launch of an exclusive memorabilia device at Jakarta, Saturday 2 November 2019.
Dewi Gita's husband claimed that lack of sleep would affect the quality of his voice such as hoarseness and discord. But, the condition can be improved by resting. "If I don't get enough rest, my voice becomes falsified, I lose my concentration, I forget the lyrics. If it's like that, the medicine is just resting. I've also never drunk alcohol. So, I'm still energetic. I also eat really patterned," said the singer of the song "January 11".
Armand is also grateful for having never suffered a vocal cord injury like his fellow vocalists. "If the vocal cords are broken like Once, Judika, Lasso (Ari Lasso), I haven't. But if they sound falsified, they have. If it's already bad, then just go to the doctor. But I have the trick, so I have to sleep," Armand said.
